means: 居住于，栖居于( inhabit的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: We all know the formula: inhabiting a brain submerged in a vat.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们都知道这种老套的情节: 浸泡于器皿的人脑仍存在意识.

sentence.Network_en: Bannock: a Native american people inhabiting southeast Idaho and western Wyoming.
sentence.Network_cn: 班诺克人: 居住于美国爱达荷州东南部和怀俄明州西部的美洲人土著.

sentence.Network_en: By virtue inhabiting a body we accept these risks.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于存在于肉体之中,所以我们接受这些风险.

PerfectNetExp.abs: tawny - colored African antelope inhabiting wet grassy plains ; a threatened species ., 茶棕色的非洲羚羊 , 居住在潮湿的草地 ; 一种濒临威胁的动物.
small scallop inhabiting shallow waters and mud flats of the North American Atlantic coast ., 栖息在北美洲大西洋沿岸的浅水和泥地中的小扇贝.
not inhabiting or frequenting trees ., 不住在树上或者不是经常出入于树木.
inhabitent 居民, inhabiting 栖蝇, inhabiting 分布

list.abs: 英语单词词根词缀总结 - 梁秋的日志 - 网易博客 ... habitant 居住者 / inhabit 居住于 inhale 吸 /.

英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... inhabit v 居住 inhabitant n 住户，居民 uninhabited a 杳无人迹的.

entry.def: If a place or region is inhabited by a group of people or a species of animal, those people or animals live there.

example.ex: The valley is inhabited by the Dani tribe.
example.tran: 山谷里居住着达尼部落。
居住在这些岛上的人们
